sentences.sentence: Mortgage lending remains the sickest part of the credit market.
sentences.translation: 抵押贷款仍旧是信贷市场最糟糕的。

sentences.sentence: The sickest people tried to go home. I don’t know if they made it.
sentences.translation: 一些危重病人试图回家，但我不知道他们最后有没有回去。

sentences.sentence: The sickest people tried to go home. I don't know if they made it.
